name: Ignis (itch) (Biga Boom)
description:
Help Thomas to take his revenge from a bunch of criminals that committed an arson crime in his house and ruined his life since he was a kid! defeat the enemies and kill their boss with fire to take the revenge!

PRESS "D" AND "Q" to move !
